name: Andersson and the Secret of Sauna
name_original: Andersson and the Secret of Sauna
description:
ANDERSSON AND THE SECRET OF SAUNA is a small game made during Creative Coast Festival Game Jam 2021 in which one to two players have to lead a small boat to the sauna. It can be played with right and left arrow keys or with a custom controller composed of two slider potentiometer. Each pot controls an oar of the boat so players have to synchronize.

Team :
Henning Steinbock – Programming
Pål schakonat – Programming
RockBlade – Graphic Design
Ali Cedroni – Sound Design
